title: GREY SCEEN ON CLIENT UPON LOGON
body:
https://gyazo.com/6799c29abbaf07ad71617bc04a362616

Grey screen upon logon. What is this? A ban or a glitch. this account is ONLY level 5.

replies.body:
This situation generally occurs when there's an issue when the server is trying to push a message to your client. You can typically work around this by logging into your account from another PC that has League on it. Alternatively, you can reach out to tech specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can assist you with this as well.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I created a new account and it works. BUT NOT THIS ACCOUNT.  This is REALLY WEIRD.
